Body:
""" Test percentage is calculated correctly """
ndarr = np.array([[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], [6, 5, 4, 3, 8, 1], [1, 1, 9, 1, 1, 1
    ], [9, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2], [3, 3, 3, 9, 3, 3], [1, 2, 2, 9, 1, 4]])
arr = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6])
exp_driver_score = np.array([5.90856, 17.81959, 9.62429, 25.08222, 28.85722,
    12.70813])
driver_score = np.round(Kruskals.Kruskals(ndarr, arr).percentage(), decimals=5)
assert np.array_equal(driver_score, exp_driver_score)
